mapper.select: SELECT u.user_srl AS userSrl, u.user_name AS userName, u.auth, u.m_number AS phone, COUNT(o.obj_srl) AS totalObjCnt FROM users AS u INNER JOIN obj AS o ON u.user_srl = o.user_srl WHERE u.user_srl = #{userSrl}
SELECT u.user_srl AS userSrl, u.user_name AS userName, COUNT(o.obj_srl) AS totalObjCnt FROM users AS u INNER JOIN obj AS o ON u.user_srl = o.user_srl WHERE u.master_srl = #{userSrl}

SELECT qr_srl AS qrSrl, obj_img AS objImage, obj_status AS objStatus, DATE_FORMAT(obj_status_at,'%Y.%m.%d, %H시%i분') AS objStatusAt FROM obj WHERE user_srl = #{userSrl} ORDER BY create_at DESC LIMIT #{limitcount},#{contentnum}
SELECT count(*) FROM obj WHERE user_srl = #{userSrl}
